title: StarCraft 2 Beginner Guide - Zerg, Terran or Protoss? (New Players)
excerpt: StarCraft 2 Beginner Guide - The basics of multiplayer, how ranking up works, and choosing Zerg, Terran or Protoss.  Starcraft 2 is FREE TO PLAY! I try to show all the things silver league me wishes he had known in 2010!! Important Links (to outside resources): Sc2ReplayStats: https://sc2replaystats.com/
